messages.content: Given a user prompt, always respond in the following JSON format: {"question_number": "number", "quiz_question": "question text", "options": ["option1", "option2", "option3", "option4"], "correct_option": "correct answer", "reference": "source"}.
Generate 5 quiz questions based on the provided text.

[{"question_number": "1", "quiz_question": "What is the capital of France?", "options": ["Berlin", "Madrid", "Paris", "Lisbon"], "correct_option": "Paris", "reference": "Page 1, Paragraph 2"}, {"question_number": "2", "quiz_question": "What is 2 + 2?", "options": ["3", "4", "5", "6"], "correct_option": "4", "reference": "Page 11, Paragraph 12"}, {"question_number": "3", "quiz_question": "What color is the sky on a clear day?", "options": ["Red", "Yellow", "Green", "Blue"], "correct_option": "Blue", "reference": "Page 5, Paragraph 3"}, {"question_number": "4", "quiz_question": "Which planet is known as the Red Planet?", "options": ["Mars", "Earth", "Jupiter", "Venus"], "correct_option": "Mars", "reference": "Page 7, Paragraph 12"}, {"question_number": "5", "quiz_question": "Who wrote 'Romeo and Juliet'?", "options": ["Mark Twain", "Charles Dickens", "William Shakespeare", "Jane Austen"], "correct_option": "William Shakespeare", "reference": "Page 10, Paragraph 3"}]

Given a user prompt, always respond in the following JSON format: {"question_number": "number", "quiz_question": "question text", "options": ["option1", "option2", "option3", "option4"], "correct_option": "correct answer", "reference": "source"}.
Generate 5 quiz questions based on the provided text.

[{"question_number": "1", "quiz_question": "What is the largest planet in our solar system?", "options": ["Earth", "Mars", "Jupiter", "Saturn"], "correct_option": "Jupiter", "reference": "Page 15, Paragraph 3"}, {"question_number": "2", "quiz_question": "Which element has the chemical symbol O?", "options": ["Oxygen", "Gold", "Osmium", "Hydrogen"], "correct_option": "Oxygen", "reference": "Page 20, Paragraph 4"}, {"question_number": "3", "quiz_question": "What is the process by which plants make food using sunlight called?", "options": ["Photosynthesis", "Respiration", "Digestion", "Evaporation"], "correct_option": "Photosynthesis", "reference": "Page 22, Paragraph 6"}, {"question_number": "4", "quiz_question": "What is the main ingredient in guacamole?", "options": ["Tomatoes", "Avocados", "Peppers", "Onions"], "correct_option": "Avocados", "reference": "Page 30, Paragraph 1"}, {"question_number": "5", "quiz_question": "Which country is known as the Land of the Rising Sun?", "options": ["China", "Japan", "Thailand", "Korea"], "correct_option": "Japan", "reference": "Page 50, Paragraph 2"}]

[{"question_number": "1", "quiz_question": "Which organ in the human body is responsible for pumping blood?", "options": ["Liver", "Lungs", "Heart", "Kidneys"], "correct_option": "Heart", "reference": "Page 12, Paragraph 1"}, {"question_number": "2", "quiz_question": "What is the boiling point of water in degrees Celsius?", "options": ["50", "75", "100", "125"], "correct_option": "100", "reference": "Page 33, Paragraph 2"}, {"question_number": "3", "quiz_question": "Which gas do plants absorb from the atmosphere?", "options": ["Oxygen", "Carbon Dioxide", "Nitrogen", "Hydrogen"], "correct_option": "Carbon Dioxide", "reference": "Page 14, Paragraph 4"}, {"question_number": "4", "quiz_question": "What is the hardest natural substance on Earth?", "options": ["Gold", "Iron", "Diamond", "Quartz"], "correct_option": "Diamond", "reference": "Page 28, Paragraph 3"}, {"question_number": "5", "quiz_question": "Who painted the Mona Lisa?", "options": ["Vincent van Gogh", "Pablo Picasso", "Leonardo da Vinci", "Claude Monet"], "correct_option": "Leonardo da Vinci", "reference": "Page 4, Paragraph 5"}]

[{"question_number": "1", "quiz_question": "What is the capital of Japan?", "options": ["Tokyo", "Seoul", "Beijing", "Bangkok"], "correct_option": "Tokyo", "reference": "Page 3, Paragraph 1"}, {"question_number": "2", "quiz_question": "What is the primary language spoken in Brazil?", "options": ["Spanish", "Portuguese", "French", "English"], "correct_option": "Portuguese", "reference": "Page 6, Paragraph 2"}, {"question_number": "3", "quiz_question": "What is the freezing point of water in degrees Celsius?", "options": ["0", "32", "100", "212"], "correct_option": "0", "reference": "Page 10, Paragraph 3"}, {"question_number": "4", "quiz_question": "What is the largest mammal in the world?", "options": ["Elephant", "Blue Whale", "Giraffe", "Great White Shark"], "correct_option": "Blue Whale", "reference": "Page 25, Paragraph 4"}, {"question_number": "5", "quiz_question": "What element does 'H' represent on the periodic table?", "options": ["Helium", "Hydrogen", "Hafnium", "Holmium"], "correct_option": "Hydrogen", "reference": "Page 3, Paragraph 2"}]
